QuestData.Title: Algae Shakes
QuestData.Description: Now that I have properly developed my tonic, it is of utmost importance that we dispense it amongst the ill at once.$b$bPlease, take this tankard and distribute the remedy to the sick. I will try to calm the rest.
QuestData.LogDescription: Dispense the Cleansing Tonic to $1oa Nauseated Villagers in Anglepoint Wharf.
QuestData.CompletionText: This remedy was passed down to me from the tidesages that came before.$b$bI just hope it helps us now.
QuestData.RewardText: In all my days, I have never seen such an illness. We must find the source!
